Very clever.  I'd love to make it easier to make a system like this do all
=
the right things, including generating a new version of the test class per
=
data point.  But this could likely get many people 50% of the way there.

 =
  David


On Sun, Dec 16, 2012 at 9:07 AM, jens_schauder <jens.schauder@fre=
enet.de>wrote:

> **
>
>
> If anybody wants to use parameterized Test, but =
can't use the
> Parameterized Runner, she migh be interested in an approach=
 based on Rules:
>
>

eterized-tests-with-junit-rules/
>
> The idea is to have the current parame=
ter value available from the rule
> and make the rule iterate through the d=
ifferent values, passed in at
> construction time.
>

vailable at github:

es
